messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Hi!  I'm new here . . .(Saitou Pics)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Mine s boring at the moment... (http://profiles.yahoo.com/spiritus_saitou ) I m going to be changing it as soon as I get some screencaps from the
messages.messageBody:
In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <makoto@s...> wrote:

>>Everyone should fill out their profile and post a pic of their fav Shinsengumi! <<

Mine's boring at the moment... (http://profiles.yahoo.com/spiritus_saitou ) I'm going to be changing it as soon as I get some screencaps from the SaitouxKenshin fight that someone's doing for me. In the meantime, my favorite's on my LJ (http://www.livejournal.com/~spiritus_saitou), which I clipped out of saito-hajime.com's main banner.

Actually, we can also store our favorite pics of our fave guys in our own photo albums and provide the link to it over in Links. I'll have to look & see what I can upload into it & send you guys the addy.

phil


nakkinomiko12 <LMTame@...> wrote:
I couldn't find the pictures, either. :-(

Indeed. :-)

messages.subject: First Wife Question?
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, thanks you guys are the best, I actually get  it now ^ ^;;;  oh yeah one more question - did we ever settle that first wife question?  I m pretty sure
messages.messageBody:
Wow, thanks you guys are the best, I actually get it now ^ ^;;; oh yeah
one more question - did we ever settle that first wife question? I'm pretty
sure that someone asked this a while back. did Masayoshi say that she was
actually someone's sister?



=====
Saitoh Worship
~Anime Mystique~


__________________________________

messages.subject: Re: Hi!  I'm new here . . .
messages.msgSnippet: Think of it this way...  the BAKUmatsu was the war before Toba- Fushimi when the shogun (the BAKUfu) was still in power and the BoSHIN is after Toba-Fushimi
messages.messageBody:
Think of it this way... the BAKUmatsu was the war before Toba-
Fushimi when the shogun (the BAKUfu) was still in power and the
BoSHIN is after Toba-Fushimi when the Imperialists (iSHIN Shishi)
took power & became the Meiji Government. The stresses are put in
for emphasis to aid in remembering. Sometimes stupid little things
like that come in handy... like on tests. :-)

phil

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Shimazu Masayoshi" <patriot014@h...>
wrote:
> The Boshin war started at the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and ran all the
> way until the fall of the Goryokaku Fort in Hakodate (Hokkaido). As
> far as I remember, it ran from January 8th, 1868 (the Battle of
> Toba-Fushimi) to 27 June 1869, with the fall of Hakodate.
>
> Hope that helps. If there's anything else, don't hesitate to ask.
>
> --Masayoshi

messages.subject: Re: Hi!  I'm new here . . .
messages.msgSnippet: The Boshin war started at the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and ran all the way until the fall of the Goryokaku Fort in Hakodate (Hokkaido). As far as I remember, it
messages.messageBody:
The Boshin war started at the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and ran all the
way until the fall of the Goryokaku Fort in Hakodate (Hokkaido). As
far as I remember, it ran from January 8th, 1868 (the Battle of
Toba-Fushimi) to 27 June 1869, with the fall of Hakodate.

Hope that helps. If there's anything else, don't hesitate to ask.

--Masayoshi

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Hi!  I'm new here . . .
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, it s always nice to have new members join.  Are you planning on writing for the SH meets SH fanfic challenge?  Oh yeah, I ve been wanting to ask
messages.messageBody:
Hi there, it's always nice to have new members join. Are you planning on writing for the SH meets SH fanfic challenge? Oh yeah, I 've been wanting to ask this for a long time. What exactly was the Boshin war? I've been so confused between all the battle names that I probably got them wrong on my fanfic. Was it the same as the Meiji revolution, just another name? Thankx in advance you guys.
~Saitohworship

nakkinomiko12 <LMTame@...> wrote:
I'm new here. I'm thrilled to find a group of people that are as
crazy about Saitou and the Shinsengumi as I am! :-) It's always nice
to find kindred spirits!

It might take me a while before I actually start posting
anything . . .I'm still sifting through the archives and am
overwhelmed at all the information I'm finding!

--L.
